Bitcoin is extremely centralized from an Internet routing perspective. Just 13 ISPs host 30% of the entire network.
Bitcoin msgs are exchanged in clear text w/o integrity checks. Any third-party on the forwarding path can eavesdrop, modify, inject, delay.
